description: Integer part of square root of n-th Fibonacci number.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
example: a(10) = 7 because the 10th Fibonacci number is 55 and floor(sqrt(55)) = floor(7.4161) = 7.
prog: (PARI) { g=0; f=1; for (n=0, 500, write("b061287.txt", n, " ", sqrtint(g)); s=f; f+=g; g=s ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 20 2009(Sage) [floor(sqrt(fibonacci(n))) for n in xrange(0,51)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 01 2009(Maxima) makelist(floor(sqrt(fib(n))),n,0,24); /* _Emanuele Munarini_, Jul 07 2011 */
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 25 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 07 2001
